items.text: he's drifting down leg once again, and this time Hetmyer connects with the paddle shot he was attempting. Beats short fine leg, but deep square leg does well to intercept. Fifty partnership too
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: good length outside off, and Hetmyer cuts it off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: stays low! Lands on middle, and Hetmyer drags a pull off the back foot to cow corner
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: flat on middle, and Hetmyer backs away to make some extra room. Bunts a punch to long off for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and he works it off his pads to the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "Is fluffing the chance a blessing in disguise for Bangladesh? Only time will tell."
items.text: length ball outside off, and he drags a pull to the square fielder on the leg side
items.postText: Rubel may have hurt his hand while taking the catch. He's off the field for some treatment
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: tossed up just outside off, and he pushes at it with soft hands to cover. They take a quick single, and the fielder has a shy at the non-striker's stumps! He misses, and Shakib's not backing up either, so West Indies earn an extra run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: low full toss just outside off, and it's been driven with the angled bat to cover point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Sneh : "Shai Hope seems like a classical dance expert who mistakenly landed on a night club dance floor."
items.text: full outside off, and that's been pushed away to the fielder at deep extra cover. Drinks as well
items.postText: Divy: "Mighty similar situation to the first game, let's see what Windies do different here. If they can keep a decent rate and get to around 210-220 by the 40th Over, with two set batsmen, will definitely help to further their cause. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and he makes some room. Punches to cover off the back foot, but finds Mehidy there
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and he has no trouble in flicking the ball off his hips to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: straight on off, and punched back to Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: picked up, and deposited at the long-on boundary! Half-tracker and Hope opens his stance to muscle a pull over midwicket. Goes to the wide long-on boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off, but angling into Hope. Fended to cover, and gets off the strike as well
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: punched off the back foot to cover. Can't find the gap off this full delivery
items.postText: Syed Kabir: "People slamming Hope but his SR is close to Hetmyer now."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and Hope misses out on the sweep shot. Comes off his front pad, and trickles away to short third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 leg bye

items.text: good length outside off, and cut away off the back foot. Only to Mahmudullah at deep cover though
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he defends to short cover. Enough time to scamper across for one
items.postText: Safwan nabeel: "Hope is really not very slow..tamim got his 50 at 71 ball too"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: crashes into leg stump! Gets the big, big wicket of Shimron. It's a flat ball that lands on middle, and sneaks under his bat as he tries to pull to the leg side. The ball skids through after pitching, and that quicker delivery is just too much for Hetmyer to handle. He's gotta go
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, OUT

dismissal.text: SO Hetmyer  b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 30 (42b 2x4 0x6) SR: 71.42

items.text: welcomed with a flat ball on leg stump, that he has no trouble punching to long on for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, 1 run

items.text: full on off, but the ball stays low. Hope defends off the bat's toe end. Played to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: West Indies need 129 off 84 balls. Shakib to continue.
items.text: good length outside of, but turning away after pitching. Cut to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: full on leg, and he misses the sweep. Hits his front leg and the ball trickles down to short fine leg. They take a single, and the throw misses the stumps! Chance of overthrows, but the fielder's backing up
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, 1 leg bye

items.text: full just outside off. Hope comes forward to defend, and squirts a shot to the leg side. Moves to 49
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length on leg,and Powell walks down the wicket. But he punches it straight to the diving midwicket fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, no run
